channel.title: Mores on Carpentry at the University of Oslo
channel.description: Recent content in Mores on Carpentry at the University of Oslo

item.title: Initiatives we like
item.description: Other groups # We list here other initiatives, ideas and programs that aims at improving programing skills of students, PhDs, postdocs and researchers. The Carpentries # Teach foundational coding and data science skills to researchers worldwide. Join the Carpentries NeIC CodeRefinery # Teach students and researchers how to write better code and provide research groups with software development e-infrastructure tools to collaboratively develop, review, discuss, test, and share their codes.
